visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. Y-axis labels should be in Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. Title should be in Arial font, size 16, and color #000000. Data series: Two series with the names '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales', each containing monthly sales data. Custom colors: Series 1 color: #7cb5ec, Series 2 color: #434348. Additional configurations: Chart background color should be #f7f7f7, legend should be enabled and positioned at the bottom of the chart, and chart margins should be set to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes two data series named '2022 Sales' and '2023 Sales'. The X-axis and Y-axis labels are styled with Arial font, size 12, and color #333333. The chart title is styled with Arial font, size 16, and color #000000. The chart background color is set to #f7f7f7, and the legend is enabled and positioned at the bottom of the chart. The chart margins are set to 50px top, 100px right, 50px bottom, and 100px left. The data series colors are customized to #7cb5ec for '2022 Sales' and #434348 for '2023 Sales'. The column stacking is set to 'normal', and data labels are disabled.
